OWSGetCapabilities

Source: R/OWSCapabilities.R
OWSCapabilities.Rd

OWSGetCapabilities

OWSGetCapabilities

Format

R6Class object.

Value

Object of R6Class with methods for interfacing an abstract OWS Get Capabilities document.

Note

abstract class used by ows4R

Author

Emmanuel Blondel <emmanuel.blondel1@gmail.com>

Super class

ows4R::OGCAbstractObject -> OWSCapabilities

Method new()

Initializes a OWSCapabilities object

Usage

OWSCapabilities$new(
  element = NULL,
  namespacePrefix = NULL,
  url,
  service,
  owsVersion,
  serviceVersion,
  logger = NULL,
  ...
)

Arguments

element

element

namespacePrefix

namespace prefix

url

url

service

service

owsVersion

OWS version

serviceVersion

service version

logger

logger type NULL, "INFO" or "DEBUG"

...

any other parameter to pass to OWSGetCapabilities service request

Usage

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
